name: Tourist in the Waking World
description:
WARNING: this game contains a mention of a loss of a loved one and a scene describing dysphoria

Blythe A. Hext spent most of their life in Oneiron, the realm of dreams, escaping the waking world that didn't have a lot to offer. However, even though they possess the power to manipulate dreams as they please, they are left longing for something that their imagination can't grant them - company.

After accidentally meeting Piotr, a local barista, in Oneiron's corridors, Blythe decides to pay him a visit in the waking world. Little do they know, the conversations they'll have will leave them asking questions they've never asked themselves... and feeling things they've tried to push away.

This project wouldn't be possible without the help of following people:

GUI by Jaime Scribbles Games

Sprites by Silver Hatsuyuki

Backgrounds by Katelynn Parsec

Proofreading by Jordan

Music:

by Scott Buckley ("Castles in the Sky", "Undertow", "Life Is", "Decoherence")

and Kevin MacLeod ("Dreams Become Real")

Compass in the logo: Wind rose created by freepik - www.freepik.com

Big thanks to Ali, Domi, Wikotria, Jersey, my cats and everyone who supported and believed in me.
